name: Archer Librarian
description:
Welcome to the library.

You've been hired to sort books onto tables and shelves.
Line up three books on a shelf to have customers take them.
Place them on tables to keep them off the floor.

Your operating area will shrink as more customers come.
So - we've decided to help you out by giving you a bow.
Good luck, new hire. And happy sorting!

Controls
WASD to move around
Mouse to hook and shoot books

Credits
Game design and  programming by Neverdusk.
Art by Joustist.

Music
Funky Chunk Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
